name: KiviCare – Clinic & Patient Management System (EHR)
author: iqonic

sections.description:
Launch your Online Clinic in 60 Seconds! ðŸš€
KiviCare is the most simple self-hosted clinic and patient management solution based on WordPress platform. Setup your online clinic instantly.

KiviCare is a result of 3years of development. Its one and only Medical EHR solution on WordPress built with VUE JS for pure MAGICAL EXPERIENCE.

DEMO | PRO | WP Theme | Zoom Telemed | Google Meet Telemed | Mobile App | Docs

Clinic Management made (incredibly) Easy & Affordable
Form Appointment Booking to Billing, everything you will ever need to manage your clinic and patient records effortlessly.

A WordPress plugin that doesn’t feel like one.

Features

  1. Built with Vue JS – No page reloads.
  2. Appointment Booking
  3. Patient Records.
  4. Encounter (Patient Visits) Management
  5. Patient Portal
  6. Doctors Scheduling
  7. Doctor Services
  8. Multiple Roles: Super Admin, Clinic Admin, Doctor, Receptionist, Patient.
  9. Paypal Integration for Online Payments
  10. Email Reminders & Notification
  11. Custom Email Templates
  12. Custom Fields for prominent forms.
  13. Powerful Settings Panel
  14. Multilanguage support via translation plugins
  15. Insightful Dashboard
  16. Website Widgets & Blocks for
    a. Booking Form / Button [kivicareBookAppointmentButton]
    b. Doctor List
    c. Login/Register Page [kivicareRegisterLogin]

Pro Features

  1. Multi Clinic Setup
  2. WooCommerce Payment Integration
  3. Google Calendar Integraion
  4. SMS alerts via Twilio integration
  5. WhatsApp alerts via Twilio
  6. Advanced Styling options
  7. RTL Support
  8. Reports
  9. Zoom Telemed Integration (Addon)
  10. Google Meet Telemed Integration (Addon)

**KiviCare Premium Products **

From EHR to Telemed to Mobile apps, KiviCare has a range of interoperable products to make a perfect solution for you.

  • KiviCare Pro
  • KiviCare WordPress Theme
  • Zoom Telemed Addon
  • Google Meet Telemed Addon
  • Flutter Mobile App

Services
Need help from our Experts for Setup or Customization?
Contact Us

Support
– Documentation
– Video Tutorials

FEEDBACK

Kivicare â€“ One and only Medical EHR solution on WordPress. Built with by VUE JS and Experience is like pure MAGIC. Do try it out.

sections.faq:
Does it work with any theme?

Yes, you can use it with any theme.

Can I customize Vue JS front-end code?

No. our front-end is built in Vue JS. Sourcecode of which is not included in the FREE plugin. You can get the extended license of PRO version for Vue JS source code

How to get support for the free version?

Support for the Free version is only via Documentation and Video Guides

Where can I report bugs, or request new features?

Yes, weâ€™d love to hear from you at hello@iqonic.design.
